title: Nude painting sets record at $157 million
text:
Nude painting sets record at $157 million 10:31am EDT - 01:25
A nude portrait by Amedeo Modigliani sold for $157.2 million at Sotheby’s on Monday, achieving the 4th-highest price for any work of art at auction. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A nude portrait by Amedeo Modigliani sold for $157.2 million at Sotheby’s on Monday, achieving the 4th-highest price for any work of art at auction. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2L5KAqy
